beer.beer_description: Currently N/A.  Vale/Drk is an American dark lager that's locally brewed to suit the Australian palate. It leaves a crisp refreshing finish balanced with coffee and chocolate flavours, its perfect on cooler days but not so heavy that it can't be enjoyed all year round.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 30 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 7!
